description:
AstroGrep is a Microsoft Windows GUI File Searching (grep) utility. Its features include regular expressions, versatile printing options, stores most recent used paths and has a "context" feature which is very nice for looking at source code. 

# Install Location
By default, AstroGrep will install to `C:\Program Files (x86)\AstroGrep` (or `C:\Program Files\AstroGrep` if it's a 32-bit version of Windows).

The default install location can be overridden by setting parameters on the command line. For example, to install into to `E:\apps folder\astrogrep`, run:

```
choco install astrogrep --installargs='/D="E:\apps folder\astrogrep"'
```
summary: AstroGrep is a Microsoft Windows GUI File Searching (grep) utility.
author: Theodore Ward, Curtis Beard
